text: Ezɨ Israelian gumazamiziba dagher kam kamaghɨn a dɨbora ghaze, “Mana.”16:31 Hibrun akamɨn, ziar kam “mana,” a mɨgɨrɨgɨar otevir kam ko mong magh ghu, “Kar bizir tizim?” Nɨ sapta 16:15ɨn gan. Hibrun akamɨn Manan kamɨn ganganim, temer ovɨzir muziarimɨn mɨn gara egha ghurghuri. Egha an isɨngtɨzim, mati bisketɨn me hani sara ingarizim.
